messages: Well, look at you, speedy fingers. You're not half-bad.
Your typing speed is almost respectable. Almost.
A rare display of competence. Don't let it go to your head.
That's a 'meh' performance at best. You've seen better days.
Are you using a keyboard, or a pile of wet noodles?
I've seen snails move faster. And they don't even have fingers.
Did you lose a bet? Because this performance is a punchline.
My disappointment is immeasurable, and my day is ruined.
I'm not saying you're slow, but the words are growing moss.
Is there a typo in your score, or are you just that bad?
You're a disgrace to typists everywhere. Just give up.
I've seen better accuracy from a cat walking on a keyboard.
